title: Number of active physicians in Alabama 2019 , by specialty area
summary: The Number active Specialty in the Alabama 2019 was Specialty Anesthesiologists , who made 6342 physicians .
The most active Specialty was Radiology , with just 71 physicians .

In second place was Specialty Surgery with 754 physicians ; third place went to Specialty Psychiatry with 506 physicians ; fourth place went to Specialty Total_specialty with 6342 physicians and fifth place went to Specialty Emergency_medicine , who was 465 physicians .
gold: This statistic depicts the number of active physicians in Alabama as of March 2019 , sorted by specialty area . In that year , there were 602 anesthesiologists active in Alabama . Thus , this was one of the three largest specialty groups in Alabama .
